original_text: But Joash king of Judah took all the sacred objects dedicated by his predecessors—Jehoshaphat, Jehoram and Ahaziah, the kings of Judah—and the gifts he himself had dedicated and all the gold found in the treasuries of the temple of the Lord and of the royal palace, and he sent them to Hazael king of Aram, who then withdrew from Jerusalem.
korean_text: 유다의 왕 요아스가 그의 조상들 유다 왕 여호사밧과 여호람과 아하시야가 구별하여 드린 모든 성물과 자기가 구별하여 드린 성물과 여호와의 성전 곳간과 왕궁에 있는 금을 다 가져다가 아람 왕 하사엘에게 보냈더니 하사엘이 예루살렘에서 떠나갔더라

sentences.original_text: But Joash king of Judah took all the sacred objects
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 유다 왕 요아스는 모든 성물들을 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: dedicated by his predecessors—Jehoshaphat, Jehoram and Ahaziah
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 선대 왕들인 여호사밧, 여호람, 아하시야가 바친

sentences.original_text: and the gifts he himself had dedicated
and all the gold found in the treasuries
of the temple of the Lord and of the royal palace
and he sent them to Hazael king of Aram
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것들을 아람 왕 하사엘에게 보냈습니다
